metadata.title: CVE-2018-10094 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Dolibarr before 7.0.2 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via vectors involving integerparameters without quotes.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
